main event: A red, elliptical light was observed in the sky over Norwich, New York on July 13, 1963.
interesting points: The object made several right angle turns before disappearing,It was observed for approximately 20 seconds at an altitude of 3000 feet,The object appeared to be half the size of the full moon with no sound or trail,Mr. and Mrs. Doe reported the sighting to the civil defense office shortly after,The investigation was conducted by Richard F. Case from the Durham-Mallison Airforce Station.
witness description: Mr. John Doe, age 24, and Mrs. Jane Doe, age 23, both residents of Norwich, New York
